results.title: To Catch a Snake: Largest Python Found in Everglades Signals a Threat
results.abstract: The Burmese python caught by a team of trackers breaks a record and shows the invasive species surviving in Florida’s ecosystem despite efforts to remove those snakes.

results.title: After Decades of Searching, 1898 Film of New Orleans Mardi Gras Is Found
results.abstract: Believed to be the oldest film of New Orleans, the roughly two-minute movie shows both long-held traditions of the parade and rituals that have been changed or forgotten.

media.caption: A scene from a film showing New Orleans Mardi Gras in 1898. The recently discovered film has stunned local historians.

results.title: Kayaking: An Outdoor Adventure and a Full-Body Workout
results.abstract: Watercraft sales exploded during the pandemic, and many more garages now have kayaks in them. But do you know how to get the best workout in one?

results.title: F.B.I. Raids Orlando Museum and Removes Basquiat Paintings
results.abstract: All 25 works in the museum’s Jean-Michel Basquiat exhibition were seized by the F.B.I. An affidavit called into question their origin and their authenticity.
